info.description: API for managing tasks and projects
info.title: Task Management API

index.description: Returns a paginated list of tasks with optional filtering by status and priority

show.description: Returns a single task by ID

create.description: Creates a task and returns the created resource

archive.description: Marks a task as archived. Archived tasks are hidden from default listings but can still be retrieved.

author_name.description: Name of the person who wrote the comment

body.example: This looks good, ready for review.

task.description: A task representing work to be completed

archived.description: Whether the task has been archived

assignee.description: User responsible for completing this task

created_at.description: Timestamp when the task was created

description.description: Detailed description of what needs to be done
description.example: Add OAuth2 login support for Google and GitHub providers

task_create_payload.description: A task representing work to be completed

user.description: A user who can be assigned to tasks
